topics.body:
Tips in drawing:

1) Use coloured pencils.
2) Draw simple shapes.
3) Don't learn fucking human skeleton. Who the hell has the time for this?!
4) Keep doing it.
5) Treat every shitty work you do as a work of art.
6) Use references.
7) Have motivation.
8) Draw a simpler version first if you're having trouble.
9) Have some music.
10) Don't look as you draw. Imagine it as you draw and just follow the lines.

"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541b8a66368720888180400#post_5541b8a66368720888180400
Fap

Draw

Draw and fap to what you drew


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5541b8bb636872179b1a0300#post_5541b8bb636872179b1a0300
*MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM*
